snippet: The right says Washington spends too much. The left says it taxes too little. Historical and global comparisons suggest both are right, although to different degrees.
abstract: The right says Washington spends too much. The left says it taxes too little. Historical and global comparisons suggest both are right, although to different degrees.

headline.main: U.S. Spends Too Much, Taxes Too Little. Neither Candidate Has Offered a Real Solution
